my_moviemon.Title: Fifty Shades of Grey
my_moviemon.Writer: Kelly Marcel (screenplay by), E.L. James (based on the novel by)
my_moviemon.Actors: Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan, Jennifer Ehle, Eloise Mumford
my_moviemon.Plot: Literature student Anastasia Steele's life changes forever when she meets handsome, yet tormented, billionaire Christian Grey.
my_moviemon.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 9 wins & 27 nominations.

my_moviemon.Title: Hulk
my_moviemon.Writer: Stan Lee (Marvel comic book character), Jack Kirby (Marvel comic book character), James Schamus (story), John Turman (screenplay), Michael France (screenplay), James Schamus (screenplay)
my_moviemon.Actors: Eric Bana, Jennifer Connelly, Sam Elliott, Josh Lucas
my_moviemon.Plot: Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.
